body: I think you forgot to resize the tensor, so this will result in invalid memory accesses. Also, take the `.data` outside of the loop, it has a bunch of type checks inside IIRC and we don't want to do them at every step
body_html: I think you forgot to resize the tensor, so this will result in invalid memory accesses. Also, take the .data outside of the loop, it has a bunch of type checks inside IIRC and we don't want to do them at every step
